header_str.value: Status;Order;Rule Name;Description;Type;Region;Classification Type;Tariff Number;Confidence Level;Matching Rule;Valid From;Valid To

value.sql_statement_or_var:
MERGE [dbo].[MIC_rule] t 
                            USING [dbo].[MIC_rule_temp]	s
                            ON (t.[Rule Name] = s.[Rule Name])
                            WHEN MATCHED AND t.[Tariff Number] != s.[Tariff Number]
                                THEN UPDATE SET
                                        t.[Tariff Number] = s.[Tariff Number]
                                        ,t.[Status] = 'tariff code updated'

                            WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE
                                THEN UPDATE SET t.[Status] = 'deleted'
                            WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET
                                THEN INSERT 
                                           (   [Status]
                                                  ,[Order]
                                                  ,[Rule Name]
                                                  ,[Description]
                                                  ,[Type]
                                                  ,[Region]
                                                  ,[Classification Type]
                                                  ,[Tariff Number]
                                                  ,[Confidence Level]
                                                  ,[Matching Rule]
                                                  ,[Valid From]
                                                  ,[Valid To])
                                     VALUES
                                               (   'add new'
                                                      ,s.[Order]
                                                      ,s.[Rule Name]
                                                      ,s.[Description]
                                                      ,s.[Type]
                                                      ,s.[Region]
                                                      ,s.[Classification Type]
                                                      ,s.[Tariff Number]
                                                      ,s.[Confidence Level]
                                                      ,s.[Matching Rule]
                                                      ,s.[Valid From]
                                                      ,s.[Valid To]);
